description: Try our easy to follow Pasta With Asparagus & Zucchinis recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pasta With Asparagus & Zucchinis Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 cloves garlic, grated or finely chopped
1 bunch fine asparagus spears, trimmed and stalks cut into 3
1 handful fresh flat-leaf parsley, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large frying pan, add the onion and a pinch of salt, and cook over a low heat for 5 minutes or until soft and translucent. Add all the zucchinis, and cook for 10 minutes or until they have cooked down and softened. Don’t allow them to brown.

Stir in the garlic and asparagus. Add the wine, raise the heat, and allow to boil for 2-3 minutes, then return to a simmer. Cook for 2-3 minutes, or until the asparagus has softened, then stir in the capers and lemon zest.

Meanwhile, cook the pasta in a large pan of boiling salted water for 10 minutes or until it is cooked but still has a bit of bite to it. Drain, keeping back a tiny amount of the cooking water. Return the pasta to the pan and toss together. Add the zucchini mixture and parsley, then toss again. Sprinkle with Parmesan and serve.
